name: aplicacion-de-reservas
description: Estructura de la pagina es: /frontend  ├── public/  └── src/      ├── components/    # UI (Form, Table, SeatMap)      ├── pages/         # Login, Dashboard, ReservationForm      ├── services/      # API wrappers (axios)      ├── routes/        # React Router setup      └── utils/         # hooks, helpers
